name: The 5th Conference on Astrophysics and Space Science
content: The 5th Conference on Astrophysics and Space Science (APSS 2018) will be held in Sanya, China during December 1-3, 2018\. APSS is an annual regular conference since 2015 and has been successfully held in Shanghai, China and Bangkok, Thailand. APSS 2018 will be a valuable and important platform for inspiring Intâ€™l and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Astrophysics and Space Science.
